title: Understanding HTML Structure
description: Learn about HTML tags and document structure

content.data: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

title: CSS Selectors and Properties
description: Master CSS selectors and common properties

content.data: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style and layout web pages.

title: Understanding Closures
description: Learn what closures are and how to use them in JavaScript.

content.data: A closure is the combination of a function and the lexical environment within which that function was declared.

title: Promises and Async/Await
description: Learn how to work with promises and the async/await syntax for handling asynchronous operations.

content.data: Promises in JavaScript are used to handle asynchronous operations.

title: Introduction to Generics
description: Learn how to use generics in TypeScript.

content.data: Generics are a powerful way to create reusable code.
